item.description:
Something different!

Top Gun Imax 3D movie will only be available at the theaters for a week. Because we cant fly, some of us want to drive and see it. This should be fun. So, anyone want to join us. The show is also at the Natick Jordan's Furniture. Some of us are leaving at noon, have lunch there, and make the Sunday matinee at 2:00 :-) Here are showtimes for Top Gun: An IMAX 3D Experience (PG, 1 hr 50 min) at IMAX 3D Theatre at Jordan's Furniture - Natick on 02/09/13: 2:00 PM | 4:30 PM | 7:00 PM | 9:30 PM Theater Address: 1 Underprice Way, Natick, MA 01760 Find more showtimes and tickets on Fandango for Top Gun: An IMAX 3D Experience and other movies!

This one movie increased the US Nave recruits by 500 percent!

 

 

  • The story of an elite group of pilots competing to be the best in their class and earn the title of “TOP GUN” captured the imagination of a generation and earned a worldwide box office of over $350 million upon its release. The film stars Tom Read More
  • Cast: Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Anthony Edwards
  • Director: Tony Scott
  • Genres: 3D, Action/Adventure, IMAX

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Top Gun: An IMAX 3D Experience NEW UPDATE
